    A builder to create relationship definition objects.

    Builds and returns a relation object.

    newInstance(string $type, string $name, array $info, Aura\Marshal\Manager $manager) : \Aura\Marshal\Relation\RelationInterface

    Parameters

    $type

    string

    The name of the native type in the manager.

    $name

    string

    The name of the native field for the related entity or collection.

    $info

    array

    An array of relationship definition information.

    $manager

    A type manager.
